#summary Stub for the Taimen Framework for Java and Clojure

= Introduction =

This is a stub article for [https://bitbucket.org/kumarshantanu/taimen/ Taimen], a REST-compatible web framework for Java and Clojure

_From the [https://bitbucket.org/kumarshantanu/taimen/ Taimen repository landing page]:_

 An XML-free, REST-compatible, minimalistic, Servlet based MVC-2 framework for Java that can be easily used in dynamic JVM languages.
